articles.title: Instagram says it’ll stop supporting the IGTV app - The Verge
articles.description: Instagram has announced that it’s shutting down the IGTV app, which was introduced in 2018 as a competitor to YouTube. Since then, it’s struggled to entice users, especially after Reels came along.
articles.content:
It walked so Reels could run (or at the very least become a competent TikTok clone)
RIP, IGTV.
Image: Instagram
Instagram has announced that it will no longer be supporting the separate IGTV app, … [+2237 chars]
